item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-08-07
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• RT: Tripped the circuit braker on the conveyor belt for the refiner. Chocolate everywhere! (via @TazaChocolate) #
  • Trying the whole working nomad thing, so far it's not too bad. The cafe I'm in is a bit loud but my headphones mostly drown it out. #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
